column3: utACK  when testing someone should check that it doesn't break -help-debug\n
It doesn't change the -help-debug behavior: bitcoind -help -help-debug prints more options than bitcoind -help.\n
What about the GUI path here?\n
QT is already handling -help and -version before the datadir - see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/qt/bitcoin.cpp#L531\n

```
